Importing libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
## Problem 1 

Read the pols-month csv into a dataframe and clean up data 

```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |> 
  mutate(
    month = month.name[as.numeric(month)],
    president = ifelse(
      prez_gop > prez_dem, "gop", "dem"
    )
  ) |> 
  select(-day, -prez_gop, -prez_dem)
```
